Curator's comments: Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Nos. 1208-9 Originally one (?) demotic papyrus (now palimpsest, partly legible)". Cf. P BM EA 10209. Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
The Beatifications are published in J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien III Osirisliturgien in Papyri der Spaetzeit (Heidelberg 2008).
